product_name: Charlotte TilburyMagic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid is a visibly age-defying moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to plump the look of skin and diminish the look of wrinkles, leaving your complexion visibly glowing and prepped for flawless makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsGood for: Anti-AgingGood for: DrynessBest for Dry SkinRefill AvailableHyaluronic AcidWithout Sulfates SLS & SLESKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Moisturizes skin's outer layers for up to 24 hours for a softer, smoother, plumper look and feel.Vitamins C and E: Visibly brighten and even skin tone while fighting dullness.Bionymph Peptide Complex: Diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and visibly improves skin's smoothness.Research Results3x hydration in 1 hour*Wrinkles appear 2x reduced in 8 weeks*94% agree foundation lasts longer**98% agree creasing is reduced***In a clinical trial on 29 people over 8 weeks**Independent user trial on over 120 people, 12 hrs after application of Magic Cream and FoundationItem 2619315How To UseTo visibly boost your complexion:Starting from your lower cheeks, sweep cream out and up.Tap your fingertips across your cheeks, avoiding your eye contour.To visibly define your contours:Use your fingers to smooth outward and upward beneath your cheekbones.To visibly define your jawline:Gently pinch your chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion.To smooth the appearance of your forehead:Starting in the middle of your forehead, massage in circular motions, moving out toward your temples.Pat any excess product in with your ring finger.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil/Huile VÃ©gÃ©tale, Isononyl Isononanoate, Cetyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Polyester-7, Phenoxyethanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Steareth-21, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Carbomer, Dimethiconol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Hydrolyzed Viola Tricolor Extract, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Michelia Alba Leaf Oil, Sodium Lactate, Coco-Glucoside, PEG-8, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Nicotiana Sylvestris Leaf Cell Culture, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To visibly boost your complexion:Starting from your lower cheeks, sweep cream out and up.Tap your fingertips across your cheeks, avoiding your eye contour.To visibly define your contours:Use your fingers to smooth outward and upward beneath your cheekbones.To visibly define your jawline:Gently pinch your chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion.To smooth the appearance of your forehead:Starting in the middle of your forehead, massage in circular motions, moving out toward your temples.Pat any excess product in with your ring finger.

reviews.headline: Priceless!
reviews.comments: I could not wait to try this product! It was amazing! So moisturizing around my eyes and I woke up with visibly reduced pores after the first use. I usually use pricey products sparingly, but I now use liberally for best results!

reviews.headline: hydration perfection
reviews.comments: I love Charlottes Magic creamâ€¦ perfect for hydration all day long.  Use it before applying Charlottes Wonder Glow skin primerâ€¦ perfect canvas for applying your favorite foundation orâ€¦ nothing at all!!!

reviews.headline: LOVE!!!
reviews.comments: This cream is amazing.  It feels better on my skin than any other product I've used and smells like a rose petal.  Top of the line product.  I will buy this as long as they continue to make it.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Incredible. I went out and bought more. And one for my mom and sister. It smells amazing and hydrates my skin so well. It doesn't make me breakout which is rare for me. Totally worth it.

reviews.headline: Break out
reviews.comments: After about a week of using it just in the morning, my skin breaks out and turns bumpy. I think it's the acid in it.

reviews.headline: Magic Cream
reviews.comments: Love this face cream! I have been using it for years.

reviews.headline: Boo on the skimp
reviews.comments: It feels so luxurious and is super hydrating. I definitely saw a difference in my skin (not as dull). Because I love this product so much, i'd buy the refills. I've gotten two so far and i feel like they've skimped a lot. 10% less in price but i feel like they only give you 80% of the 1.7oz which is a bummer. It also smells like sunscreen which i dont particularly love

reviews.headline: Amazing but expensive
reviews.comments: it was fantastic but it was very expensive, packing was fancy, and the only ting I hate about it is that I is super expensive

reviews.headline: Doesn't like my skin
reviews.comments: I don't know why maybe it's the amount of acid in this product that my pores get irritated by and i get a break out.  Soon as i stop using it, my skin calms down. Now i stay away from hyaluronic acid products. For moisturizing

reviews.headline: Most amazing face moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer! It is luxurious on my skin. I wish it was so freaking expensive. I purchase the refill to fit in my original glass jar. I get soo many compliments on my skin i look like I just had a facial. The glow is the best in the west. I have not found anything that compares. Splurge and give it a try. It is a thicker cream, but absorbs beautifully into skin. I would give a good estimate that a 1.7oz container lasts me about 3 months using it once a day, sometimes two.

reviews.headline: SO WORTH THE SPLURGE
reviews.comments: this makes my skin feel like a flipping new- norn baby! (and their bottom) it has a delectable  scent and my skin eats this up and up and up and up over and over again! love!

reviews.headline: Insane price for a mediocre product
reviews.comments:
Does it do what it's supposed to do? Yes. 
Does it do it better than a drugstore brand? Absolutely not. 
It smells like my grandmother, which could be a "pro" for some but not for me. Very "Old Rose" scented. 
I would not purchase this again.
It's just Meh

reviews.headline: Charlotte Tilbury is amazing
reviews.comments: So much improvement in my face and neck.  Also the back of my hands.

reviews.headline: It's like I stepped into a time machine!
reviews.comments: This product makes my skin so soft, so supple and hydrated! Highly highly recommend. A little pricey but so worth it!

reviews.headline: Luxurious
reviews.comments: These product smells like natural skin care. I did not check the ingredients, though. It feels rich and luxurious. You do not need a lot to cover your entire face which helps with the price tag. I think it's nice & moisturizing! It pairs beautifully with the corresponding serum.

reviews.headline: Truly Magical
reviews.comments: This cream is fantastic in plumping fine lines and wrinkles. Foundation goes on smooth. Skin is Hydrated all day. Great price and the jar lasts me 4-5 months. I highly recommend

reviews.headline: Feels good!
reviews.comments: I'm on my second jar of  the Magic Cream Moisturizer.  I like it! I use the oil on top.  I can't necessarily say that it has changed my skin but, I've been blessed with pretty good skin to begin with.  I do like the moisture it gives.

reviews.headline: Wonderful face cream!
reviews.comments:
I love the way it works and the scent is very nice! I can't wait to try some of the other products in this line!

It would be even better if Ulta would send me a usable coupon once in a while, instead of spam coupons that do nothing except to clog up my email inbox! Please!

reviews.headline: Good texture, broke my skin out bad
reviews.comments: I love the way this glides onto the skin and it smells really nice, but ultimately after a few weeks if broke my skin out pretty bad so i gave it away. I wish i wouldnt have wasted my money on it.

reviews.headline: Overpriced
reviews.comments: Received a free sample and was so excited to try! The product feels nice on the skin and a little definitely goes a long way, but its soooo overly scented! I saw another comment that said it smells powdery and intotally agree. It smells like a product my grandmother would wear and gives me a headache. Also the ingredient list is insane.

Great skin cream for under makeup and aging skin!

faceoff_positive.comments:
5+++ stars. Amazing. Luxurious. And yes, absolute Magic. With the hype around this cream, I was skeptical, intrigued, and a little hesitant to try it. Why? Honestly, I was afraid I would like it and then I would have to tussle with the high price tag. The verdict, of courseâ€” this is an amazing cream that is truly transforming! It is indeed expensive, so let me tell you why I might just be hooked. 

When I received this voxbox, I was thrilled, even with just the beautiful packaging and jar. But, I was also a little unsure whether this cream would work for my skin. I have overall normal skin, with an occasional tendency for dryness and sensitivity. The cream does have a light scentâ€” maybe roseâ€” but it is pleasant, light, non-irritating, and it doesn't linger. The cream is a light- medium texture. Thicker than a gel, thinner than a "standard cream". At first, it seemed like this consistency would be too thick to wear under makeup and that it would be better as a night cream. But, I was wrongâ€” this worked perfectly for both a morning and night moisturizer, blending seamlessly into skin and creating a glowing canvas for makeup. 

I applied the Magic Cream to clean skin, gently massaging it in and around my face. The box and website details the recommended "Tilbury Tap" technique for best results. This is a 5-step and 5 minute facial massage that starts at your cheeks and works around your face (see her website and/or pic here). This sounds lovely and it's fine for an evening routine, but I often don't have the time or patience for a 5 minute morning facial. So rest assured, basic blending works perfectly for this cream too. It's almost like a thin melting balmâ€” it melts into your skin like magic! My skin readily absorbed this cream, instantly looking and feeling moisturized and glowing. Best part is that the dewy glow makes your skin radiant, but it doesn't make it sticky or greasy. Matte makeup formulas still work perfectly over this cream, giving with a smooth finish. 

Since incorporating the cream into my routine, my skin has been softer, firmer, more supple. I really get why this is iconic. My only complaint is minorâ€” I wish that the cream came with a spatula or scoop. 

Other amazing details on the magic cream:

â¤ï¸ The ingredients include Vitamins C & E, rosehip oil, aloe Vera, shea butter, camellia oil. These work together to brighten, smooth, calm, revitalize your complexion. 

â¤ï¸ The cream contains hyaluronic acid and a bionymph peptide for hydration and plump skin.

â¤ï¸The box fills every free space and flap with product information and described the famous Tilbury Tap. 

â¤ï¸The glass jar is beautiful and refillable! Buy on the brand website, and the jar is engravable, and you can return your jar for a discount on a future purchase.

I LOVE this cream, and I cannot recommend it highly enough. #MagicSkin #MagicCream #CharlotteTilbury #voxbox #skincare #moisturizer
faceoff_positive.headline: Magic in a jar. 5+++ stars. Amazing. Luxurious. In

faceoff_negative.comments: So I was super excited to he chosen for this campaign. I will start off by saying the packaging was beautiful. I love the look of the glass jar and gold lid. The cream looked quite thick and I was pleasantly surprised that it went on smoothly over my face and neck. The product didn't feel thick on my face it actually felt light. The smell was OK. It had a very slight smell of an SPF but it wasn't enough to make me stop using it. I've been using this now for over a month and I have sensitive skin. I haven't noticed any sensitivity reactions to the moisturizer whatsoever. That's a huge plus in my book. While I do like the product I don't like having to scrape out the moisturizer with my finger or nail. Maybe the product designers could come up with some sort of "spoon" built into the lid to assist in getting the product out of the jar. While most moisturizers at any price point usually last me about 6 months this jar is already more than halfway gone in only a month. I didn't see enough of a difference in my face to justify using it after this jar is gone. All in all I liked the product but with the price and amount you get in the jar I don't see myself purchasing it in the future. If the jar was larger and the product lasted longer for that price I definitely would. If I would've seen a significant change in my face while using this every morning and evening for a month than price wouldn't even matter to me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Fine on sensitive skin
